body:
Comment 1: 
+gri

I am not sure this is a bug. If it was pre-Go 1 I would rewrite the spec to disallow
this, but the spec (http://golang.org/ref/spec#Composite_literals) says "multiple
elements with the same ... constant key value", and struct literals like Key{1, 2} are
not constants in the spec sense of the word.

So I think this is probably unfortunate and working as intended.

But I'd like to see if Robert agrees.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
